title: Ticket #4303: condor_config_val -set -unset -rset -runset
description:
condor_config_val

More testing after param values and table changed. The goal here was to hit multiple scenarios of set and rset to first, verify they are still working as planned and second, catch any futures issues right away.

Will make it faster when a possible issue within condor_who -daemon is fixed such that we determine the daemon restart using a call to NewIsRunnningYet within a new function in CondorTest.pm called PersonalBackUp().
check_ins:
